# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession but a symbol of excellence and innovation, which I believe could significantly enrich your life or business. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $750000, considering the potential it holds for you. I trust that you will appreciate its true worth and see the exceptional value it can bring to your endeavors. If you are interested in exploring this opportunity further, please let me know, and we can arrange a time to discuss the details in more depth. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
